original: Hetuṁ hetusampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nahetusampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: hetum hetu sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca na hetu na hetu sampayuttaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe ekaṁ, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… aññamaññe pañca, vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate pañca. (Sahetukasadisaṁ.)
analyzed: hetuyā tīṇi ārammaṇe eka adhipatiyā tīṇi pe aññamaññe pañca vipāke tīṇi pe avigate pañca sa hetuka sadisa

original: Hetuṁ hetuvippayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nahetuvippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: hetum hetu vippayuttam dhammam paṭicca na hetu na hetu vippayuttaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Nahetuṁ hetuvippayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanahetu nahetuvippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na hetum hetu vippayuttam dhammam paṭicca na na hetu na hetu vippayuttaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe cattāri …pe… purejāte āsevane ekaṁ …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate cattāri.
analyzed: hetuyā cattāri ārammaṇe cattāri pe purejāte āsevane ekam pe vipāke tīṇi pe avigate cattāri
